00042 #ifndef __vtkParticleSpringSystem_h
00043 #define __vtkParticleSpringSystem_h
00044 
00045 #include "vtkParticleSpringSystemWin32Header.h"
00046 #include "vtkPolyDataAlgorithm.h"
00047 
00048 #include "vtkMotionEquationSolver.h"
00049 
00050 class vtkMassProperties;
00051 
00052 class vtkSpring;
00053 class vtkSpringCollection;
00054 class vtkParticle;
00055 class vtkParticleCollection;
00056 
00058 
00063 class VTK_vtkParticleSpringSystem_EXPORT vtkParticleSpringSystem : public vtkPolyDataAlgorithm {
00064 public:
00065 
00067     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkParticleSpringSystem,vtkPolyDataAlgorithm);
00069     static vtkParticleSpringSystem * New();
00071     void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00072 
00074 
00077     void Init();
00078 
00080 
00083     void Step();
00084 
00085     //Parameters for Particle-Spring System
00087     vtkSetMacro(SpringCoefficient, double);     // Spring coefficient
00089     vtkSetMacro(DistanceCoefficient, double);   // Distance constraint coefficient
00091     vtkSetMacro(DampingCoefficient, double);    // Damping coefficient
00093     vtkSetMacro(DeltaT, double);                // dt for every step
00095     vtkSetMacro(Mass, double);                  // Mass of all points (future work: specify different masses for different "layers")
00097     vtkSetMacro(Residual, double);                  // Residual error tolerance on displacement calculus
00099     vtkSetMacro(SolverType, vtkMotionEquationSolver::MotionEquationSolverType);     // Motion equation solver type
00100 
00102     vtkSetVector3Macro(Gravity, double);
00104     vtkGetVector3Macro(Gravity, double);
00105 
00107 
00111     void SetParticleStatus(vtkIdType id, bool status);
00112 
00114     void InsertCollision(vtkIdType id, double * displacement);
00115 
00117 
00121     void SetCollisions(vtkIdList * ids, vtkDoubleArray * displacements);
00122 
00124 
00127     void ComputeForces();
00128 
00129 protected:
00130     vtkParticleSpringSystem();
00131     ~vtkParticleSpringSystem();
00132 
00134     int RequestData(vtkInformation *vtkNotUsed(request), vtkInformationVector **inputVector, vtkInformationVector *outputVector);
00135 
00136     //Particle-Spring System
00138     vtkSpringCollection * Springs;
00140     vtkParticleCollection * Particles;
00142     vtkCellLinks * Links;
00143 
00144     //Model Parameters
00146     double SpringCoefficient;
00148     double DistanceCoefficient;
00150     double DampingCoefficient;
00152     double DeltaT;
00154     double Mass;
00156     double Residual;
00157 
00159     double Gravity[3];
00160 
00162     vtkMotionEquationSolver * Solver;
00164     vtkMotionEquationSolver::MotionEquationSolverType SolverType;
00165 
00166     //Contact data
00168     vtkIdList * CollisionIds;
00170     vtkDoubleArray * CollisionDisplacements;
00171 
00172 private:
00173     vtkParticleSpringSystem(const vtkParticleSpringSystem&);            // Not implemented.
00174     void operator=(const vtkParticleSpringSystem&);           // Not implemented.
00175 
00177     void CreateSpring(vtkParticle * p0, vtkParticle * p1);
00178 
00180     void ComputeContacts();
00181 
00182 };
